Package com.github.wuic.configuration

Interface Summary
Configuration Represents the possible configuration elements for compression.
DomConfigurationBuilder This interface represents a builder that can produce a Configuration using a configuration Node read from the 'wuic.xml' path.
ImageConfiguration This interface describes a configuration for image groups.
PackingConfiguration Bin packing configuration interface.
SpriteConfiguration Sprite configuration interface.
WuicEhcacheProvider This interface defines an object which provides a Cache from EHCache framework.
YuiConfiguration Represents the possible configuration elements for script compression using the YUI Compressor library.
YuiCssConfiguration Represents the possible configuration elements for CSS compression using the YUI Compressor library.
YuiJavascriptConfiguration Represents the possible configuration elements for Javascript compression using the YUI Compressor library.
